Articles.Content:
So... does this thing actually exist, or is someone trolling again?

Easter-egg hunters, get your easter-egg hunting equipment out. Rumors have been flying that some sort of cavern exists on Minmus, and it certainly won\'t find itself. Any information leading to the capture of this cavern will net a cash reward of $0. The hunt is on!

EDIT: a word

I\'m in. It shouldn\'t bee too hard to prove or disprove this, as the moon in question is quite small. Such an anomaly should be rather noticeable. It could just be a mesh glitch, maybe near one of Minimus\' poles.

I suggest we search first around the poles, as they are the likely suspects in this little drama.

Maybe we\'ll find a bear.

*puts on his dream-crushing boots*

I can confirm there\'s no such thing. If the progenitor of that rumor wasn\'t trolling, he was likely misidentifying a bug, as flaillomanz said.

Dreams have been crushed.

I think Squad should hire someone to put easter eggs in. We\'re short on them.

Dreams have been crushed.

I think Squad should hire someone to put easter eggs in. We\'re short on them.

Oh no... there are hundreds of them, you just don\'t know where to look =P

In all seriousness, Easter eggs aren\'t really meant to be plentiful, but rather few and far between.

I think Squad should hire someone to put easter eggs in. We\'re short on them.

At least three people should be working on them - I want as many easter eggs as physically possible. Not all in a small space, you understand - space will be VAST, so we can afford to have lots of them. I mean, they can even make them ahead of schedule - pyramids awaiting on proper desert regions, asteroids with smiley-faces, sharks, an ACTUAL space kraken, a cocktail lounge floating in space, and many, many references to 'Hitchhikers\' Guide to the Galaxy.' Not to mention kerbalified landmarks and crashed rockets. Giant glass domes on the Mun. Wormholes. Oh wait, that last one is more feature than easter egg.

Anyway, back to the hunt!

EDIT:

In all seriousness, Easter eggs aren\'t really meant to be plentiful, but rather few and far between.

You have never been on an easter-egg hunt in real life, have you?

You have never been on an easter-egg hunt in real life, have you?

Yes.

If all games had the density of Easter eggs that Easter egg hunts have, than Kerbin might as well be named Easter bunny land.

I think Squad should hire someone to put easter eggs in. We\'re short on them.

Don\'t you worry about easter eggs, let me worry about blank!

Don\'t you worry about easter eggs, let me worry about blank!

???.... ....

I am most interested.

Don\'t you worry about easter eggs, let me worry about blank!

Oooo, do tell, Nova. Details, man, detail.

Don\'t you worry about easter eggs, let me worry about blank!

I... I must hurl it into the sun just to prove that I can.

XD made laugh for 10 minutes

Is it a future 0.17 easter egg, or is it like your april fool easter egg from that egg-hunting thread ?
